chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: Why do I think you are avoiding me?

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: No! Not at all!!...(Avoiding eye contact and pretending to be busy looking in menu card.)

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: Ohh yes! Why not! After 15 days of me continuous calling and messaging you finally agreed to meet me. Thank you for that! …(He was bit annoyed & upset)

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: It's not like that Kartik. Achha tell me, how is your work going on? …(After putting menu card aside)

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: Work is going good. I need to tell you something and that's why I wanted to meet you.

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: Okay, but I am hungry. let's order something first.

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: Sure!

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: So Riti.. I was saying that……

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: I liked this place Kartik. It's nice. Specially this landscaping and these flowers are really beautiful!!

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: Riti, I am trying to tell you something. I could have said this over call also but then I wanted……

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: What happened to your project you were working on? You were supposed to visit China for the same right? So? when are you leaving?

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: Stop that yaar Riti!!! Will you please let me speak?Stop interrupting me for god’s sake!! Now as you had your food please shut up and listen to me? Will you??

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: See Riti! It's been long that we have known each other. I don't know exactly when this happened but I started liking you. I am….

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: Wait.. Wait..Wait! Kartik!! I know where this thing is going. To be honest I had idea about something like this might happen today.No, you can't be doing this.. please!!!

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: You had an idea??? Ohhh! No wonder you were avoiding me since 15 days. Now I get it and Thank you for spoiling my moment by the way.

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: I am so sorry for ruining it for you but I did not want this to happen.

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: But why? Am I that bad?

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: Ohh come on!! Any girl would feel lucky to have you.

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: I don't want to know about any other girls. So could we just focus on “us” part?

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: See Kartik! You are rich, Good looking guy. You will get a girl who is definitely better than me. I am just an average looking, simple girl. So why me?

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: God!!!!! Don’t tell me that philosophy of you will find a better girl and all…Please don't tell me that rubbish..!! I can't even chose a girl for me ? Wow!!! Now if you are done with your stupid drama can I propose the girl I like??

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: You are not getting me Kartik. :( I think you should give it some time.

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: So miss Ritisha will you marry me???

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: But Kartik I….

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: Shhh...Yes? or Yes??

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: I love you!!!

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: You are stupid and you know that right...??

chat.name: Kartik
chat.message: Well, I am; but you didn’t say I love too yet

chat.name: Ritisha
chat.message: I love you too Kartik.
